GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Pushmail, Super-fast Document Access and Browsing, Adobe Reader, Documents To Go
GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: USB Cable, Handset with Inbuilt Battery, Charger, Headset, User Manual

Camera.Other Camera Features: Primary Camera Features: Auto Focus, Flash Support, 4 Element F2.4 Lens, Continuous and Touch Focus, Image Stabilization, Time Shift Mode

Multimedia.Sound Enhancement: Dual Microphone for Noise Reduction, HD Voice
Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports AVI, ASF, PCM, MPEG-21, M4V, MP4, H.263, MKV, MPEG-4, 3GP, MKA, VC-1, M4A, MOV, 3GP2, VP6, WMV, H.264, WMA 9 / 10, SPARK, MPEG-4, PCM, Xvid, F4V, Full HD

Internet & Connectivity.Navigation Technology: A-GPS, GLONASS, Autonomous GPS, S-GPS, with BlackBerry Maps

Other Features.Important Apps: 100000 Apps, App and Content Ecosystem, BlackBerry Hub, BlackBerry World, Universal Search, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, Weather
Other Features.Sensors: Accelerometer, Magnetometer, Proximity Sensor, Gyroscope, Ambient Light Sensor

Display.Other Display Features: Multi-touch, Intuitive Gesture Navigation, 24-bit Color Depth

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1.5 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

Platform.Processor: 1.2 GHz + Qualcomm Snapdragon S4, Dual Core
